phones.name: Surface Duo 2
phones.title: Microsoft Surface Duo 2 Android tablet. Announced Sep 2021. Features 8.3″  display, Snapdragon 888 5G chipset, 4449 mAh battery, 512 GB storage, 8 GB RAM, Corning Gorilla Glass Victus.

phones.name: Surface Duo
phones.title: Microsoft Surface Duo Android tablet. Announced Aug 2020. Features 8.1″  display, Snapdragon 855 chipset, 3577 mAh battery, 256 GB storage, 6 GB RAM, Corning Gorilla Glass 5.

phones.name: Lumia 650
